author: Nelson Musoliwa
message: Zuma could not appreciate what this lady is explaining here as it has got to do much with numbers(economy) he thinks only ugly politics Chair is asking skewed question forgetting that there is reason behind any action markets read motives behind governance shift. Even perceptions are to be managed politics and economy works hand in hand politicians also can be alarmed by markets operations as well Cant zondo read why Nene was fired and van rooyen hired he must know that markets are keen followers of both politics and economy to protect their businesses If government change is well and reasonably explained to the markets(investors) there ant be any economic mayhem as it occurred in Nenegate Unstable political situation raise uncertainty on markets drivers so they usually reduce their economic operations in such country; simply put no one will invest with unstable countries Political instability is a cause for concern for markets role players throughout the world in this global economic jungle. To avoid policy uncertainty can only be done by a clean and transparent governance as it can have a dire consequences but it can not be absolute but can be managed as well
